pr_title: [JS] (#7913) Adding support for multi file upload.

timeline.bodyText: @tray2100 Can you please add a 1-liner explaining what this condition does and indicate that passthrough is not something officially stated in the openapi spec?
timeline.author: wing328

replies.bodyText: Sure that makes sense. I added in the comment. I also rebased and squashed the commits to make things cleaner.
replies.author: tray2100

timeline.message:
[JS] (#7913) Adding support for multi file upload. Also adding the option for individual CodeGens to specify a collectionFormat

* updated samples as well

[JS] (#7913) Adding support for multi file upload. Also adding the option for individual CodeGens to specify a collectionFormat

* updated samples as well
